channel.title: Nature Communications
channel.description:
Nature Communications is an open access, multidisciplinary journal dedicated to publishing high-quality research in all areas of the biological, health, physical, chemical and Earth sciences. Papers published by the journal aim to represent important advances of significance to specialists within each field.

We are committed to providing an efficient service for both authors and readers. Our team of independent editors make rapid and fair publication decisions. Prompt dissemination of accepted papers to a wide readership and beyond is achieved through a programme of continuous online publication.

item.title: Ferroelectric-based Pockels photonic memory
item.content:encoded:
Nature Communications, Published online: 19 September 2025; doi:10.1038/s41467-025-63850-z

Xu et al. report a Pockels photonic memory by integrating ferroelectric field-effect transistor with lithium niobate on insulator micro ring resonator. Through the manipulation of ferroelectric domains and the Pockels effect, the device achieves energy consumption at fJ/state level.
item.dc:title: Ferroelectric-based Pockels photonic memory
item.dc:creator: Zefeng Xu
Chun-Kuei Chen
Hong-Lin Lin
Maheswari Sivan
Evgeny Zamburg
James Yong-Meng Lee
Suresh Venkatesan
Aaron Danner
Aaron Voon-Yew Thean

item.title: Distinct solvation patterns of OH<sup>−</sup> versus H<sub>3</sub>O<sup>+</sup> charge defects at electrified gold/water interfaces govern their properties
item.content:encoded:
Nature Communications, Published online: 19 September 2025; doi:10.1038/s41467-025-63832-1

H3O+ and OH− mediate electrochemical processes at water/metal electrode interfaces. Here, the authors show that these ions form distinct solvation structures on electrified gold surfaces: OH+ remains in close contact with the electrode, while H3O+ resides farther away.
item.dc:title: Distinct solvation patterns of OH<sup>−</sup> versus H<sub>3</sub>O<sup>+</sup> charge defects at electrified gold/water interfaces govern their properties
item.dc:creator: Chanbum Park
Soumya Ghosh
Harald Forbert
Dominik Marx
